creator: Hey Clay
descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting DIY activity of educational creative play!

Want to teach your kid clay modeling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy.
Starting with simple balls and sausage shapes you will soon make amazing characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on experience of modeling. When used with any molding clay, play dough or plasticine it aims at improving child’s motor skills while having fun. Colorful and engaging, it instantly takes your kid on a fantastic journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn how to roll, squish and mold the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets with Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and others, the App makes learning an entertaining discovery on how to easily sculpt each of them. A Bigfoot, Doggie, Dragonfly, Bigwig, Donut, Tyrannosaurus and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And most importantly – empower your kid to create your own fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting DIY activity of educational creative play!

Want to teach your kid clay modeling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy.
Starting with simple balls and sausage shapes you will soon create amazing characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on experience of modeling. When used with any molding clay, play dough or plasticine it aims at improving child’s motor skills while having fun. Colorful and engaging, it instantly takes your kid on a fantastic journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn how to roll, squish and mold the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets of Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and some others the App turns learning into an entertaining discovery of how to sculpt each of them easily. A Bigfoot, Doggie, Dragonfly, Bigwig, Donut, Tyrannosaurus and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And more importantly – you'll have an opportunity to empower your kid to create his/her own fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

Payments

The App is designed and intended for use with HEY CLAY® modeling compound.

The App is free to download and use but the additional content may require a purchase by in-app purchase method or by purchasing our products with unlocking code. It depends on the country where you live.

In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings and setting up a password for each purchase. Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.

You are also able to restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings.

Kids, ask a parent first before downloading or making in-app purchases.

Privacy

We take children’s privacy seriously and ensure that our Apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our Privacy Policy at https://hey-clay.com/privacy-policy/

You may download, install and use our App without provision of any of your personal data.

Some of our Apps may provide you with an ability to save your progress, purchases, characters, content, etc. for future references or make them available on other devices. It is intended for parents but generally available to users who are not children and whose age is at least 13 years or more, depending on a country. And only if you use such functional, we will process some of your personal data to manage your account and to provide you with safe and excellent experience in the App usage.

When you take a photo with our App, we do not collect, use and process such a picture. It fully remains at your control and stored on your devices.

EULA

The App is subject to App Store Terms and Conditions unless otherwise indicated in the App.

Our Privacy Policy and App’s Terms and Conditions are accepted by you if you download this App. Please, stop using the App and delete it if you disagree with them.

HEY CLAY and all related logos are the trademarks of Hey Clay LLC. © 2016 Hey Clay LLC. All Rights Reserved.

creator: Hey Clay
descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting DIY world of educational and creative play!
Want to teach your child about creativity in a fun and interactive way? HEY CLAY® makes it easy. Start with simple shapes and you’ll soon be making amazing characters, just like a real sculptor!
Visit your local Co-op Food Store to collect HEY CLAY, then download the HEY CLAY Co-op app to learn how to build fun Farm Friends. The app connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on clay modelling instructions. Improving their motor skills in a fun way, kids can learn how to make their favourite farm animals from simple shapes and figures. Colourful and engaging, HEY CLAY takes your children on a fantastic journey of creative crafting!
FEATURES:
• Simple step-by-step instructions make learning clay modelling easy and intuitive
• Develop motor skills, hand-eye coordination and abstract thinking
• Amazing original colourful animation
• Capture and share creations with friends
• No third-party advertising
• Interactive, kid-friendly interface
HEY CLAY apps may be used to sculpt with any clay or dough. For the best-looking creations, use our original air-dry modelling clay so that figures harden and you can play with them as with toys!
The clay set, activity book and collector box are available for purchase in your local Co-op Food Store while quantities last.
Take pictures and share your creations with friends and family easily from the app. Tag #heyclaycoop and @CoopCRS for more fun. Make your own clay-art gallery to keep your masterpieces!
Enjoy creative clay modelling with the HEY CLAY Co-op app!
descriptionShort: Make fantastic clay Farm Friend creations with CO-OP Kids Club

descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting DIY activity of educational creative play!

Want to teach your kid clay modeling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy.
Starting with simple balls and sausage shapes you will soon create amazing characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on experience of modeling. When used with any molding clay, play dough or plasticine it aims at improving child’s motor skills while having fun. Colorful and engaging, it instantly takes your kid on a fantastic journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn how to roll, squish and mold the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets of Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and some others the App turns learning into an entertaining discovery of how to sculpt each of them easily. A Bigfoot, Doggie, Dragonfly, Bigwig, Donut, Tyrannosaurus and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And more importantly – you'll have an opportunity to empower your kid to create his/her own fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

Payments

The App is designed and intended for use with HEY CLAY® modeling compound.

The App is free to download and use but the additional content may require a purchase by in-app purchase method or by purchasing our products with unlocking code. It depends on the country where you live.

In-app purchases can be restricted by adjusting the authentication settings within your Play Store settings and setting up a password for each purchase. Disabling password protection may result in unauthorized purchases. We strongly encourage you to keep password protection turned on if you have children or if others could have access to your device.

You are also able to restrict in-app purchases by adjusting your device settings.

Kids, ask a parent first before downloading or making in-app purchases.

Privacy

We take children’s privacy seriously and ensure that our Apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA). If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our Privacy Policy at https://hey-clay.com/privacy-policy/

You may download, install and use our App without provision of any of your personal data.

Some of our Apps may provide you with an ability to save your progress, purchases, characters, content, etc. for future references or make them available on other devices. It is intended for parents but generally available to users who are not children and whose age is at least 13 years or more, depending on a country. And only if you use such functional, we will process some of your personal data to manage your account and to provide you with safe and excellent experience in the App usage.

When you take a photo with our App, we do not collect, use and process such a picture. It fully remains at your control and stored on your devices.

The App is subject to App Store Terms and Conditions unless otherwise indicated in the App.

Our Privacy Policy and App’s Terms and Conditions are accepted by you if you download this App. Please, stop using the App and delete it if you disagree with them.

creator: Hey Clay
descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting and educational DIY world!

Do you want to teach your kid clay modelling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy. Start with simple balls and sausage shapes, and your child will soon make unique characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on modelling. Colourful and engaging, it takes your children on a fun journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn to roll and bend the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets such as Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and others, the App makes learning an entertaining discovery on how to easily sculpt each of them. Bigfoot, Doggie, Penguin, Donut, Tyrannosaurus, and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And most importantly – empower your kids to create fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

FEATURES:
• Learn about clay modelling in an easy and intuitive way
• All characters contain step-by-step instructions
• Fantastic sets such as Birds, Bugs, Dinosaurs, Monsters, Aliens, and Animals to sculpt
• Helps develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, abstract thinking, and creativity
• Amazing original colourful animation
• Interactive kid-friendly interface with 5 fun games to play
• Capture & share your creations with friends
• No third-party advertising

For best-looking creations, use the original HEY CLAY® air-dry clay: it’s super light, non-sticky, and has bright colours. But the best part is that it allows you to create your own toys: model your favourite characters, wait for the clay to harden, and play with the figures as with real toys! The clay sets are available for purchase through the App.

You can also take pictures and share the creations with friends and family easily from the App. Make your clay art gallery to keep your masterpieces!

title: HEY CLAY®

container.value:
Hey Clay LLC,
225 Сurie Dr. STE 1100
Alpharetta, GA 30005

creator: Hey Clay
descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting and educational DIY world!

Do you want to teach your kid clay modelling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy. Start with simple balls and sausage shapes, and your child will soon make unique characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on modelling. Colourful and engaging, it takes your children on a fun journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn to roll and bend the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets such as Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and others, the App makes learning an entertaining discovery on how to easily sculpt each of them. Bigfoot, Doggie, Penguin, Donut, Tyrannosaurus, and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And most importantly – empower your kids to create fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

FEATURES:
• Learn about clay modelling in an easy and intuitive way
• All characters contain step-by-step instructions
• Fantastic sets such as Eco Cars, Birds, Bugs, Dinosaurs, Monsters, Aliens, Animals, Forest Animals, Farm Birds, and Ocean to sculpt
• Helps develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, abstract thinking, and creativity
• Amazing original colourful animation
• Interactive kid-friendly interface with 5 fun games to play
• Capture & share your creations with friends
• No third-party advertising

For best-looking creations, use the original HEY CLAY® air-dry clay: it’s super light, non-sticky, and has bright colours. But the best part is that it allows you to create your own toys: model your favourite characters, wait for the clay to harden, and play with the figures as with real toys! The clay sets are available for purchase through the App.

You can also take pictures and share the creations with friends and family easily from the App. Make your clay art gallery to keep your masterpieces!

Find HEY CLAY on social networks to see more creative ideas. We’d love to hear your feedback and become friends!

creator: Hey Clay
descriptionHtml:
Dive into an exciting and educational DIY world!

Do you want to teach your kid clay modelling with fun? HEY CLAY® makes it easy. Start with simple balls and sausage shapes, and your child will soon make unique characters, just like a real sculptor!

The App connects inspiring clay animation with hands-on modelling. Colourful and engaging, it takes your children on a fun journey of creative crafting!

Your kid will learn to roll and bend the clay into various shapes and figures. With amusing clay sets such as Aliens, Dinos, Monsters, and others, the App makes learning an entertaining discovery on how to easily sculpt each of them. Bigfoot, Doggie, Penguin, Donut, Tyrannosaurus, and many other creatures can materialize from the screen. And most importantly – empower your kids to create fantastic claymates you’ll be proud of!

FEATURES:
• Learn about clay modelling in an easy and intuitive way
• All characters contain step-by-step instructions
• Fantastic sets such as Eco Cars, Birds, Bugs, Dinosaurs, Monsters, Aliens, Animals, Forest Animals, Farm Birds, and Ocean to sculpt
• Helps develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination, abstract thinking, and creativity
• Amazing original colourful animation
• Interactive kid-friendly interface with 5 fun games to play
• Capture & share your creations with friends
• No third-party advertising

For best-looking creations, use the original HEY CLAY® air-dry clay: it’s super light, non-sticky, and has bright colours. But the best part is that it allows you to create your own toys: model your favourite characters, wait for the clay to harden, and play with the figures as with real toys! The clay sets are available for purchase through the App.

You can also take pictures and share the creations with friends and family easily from the App. Make your clay art gallery to keep your masterpieces!

Find HEY CLAY on social networks to see more creative ideas. We’d love to hear your feedback and become friends!
